author: sproul
content:
thank you, we'll look into this some more on the Lighthouse side

Aug 4 corresponds with our v2.5.1 release, but we didn't make any changes to block packing in that release, so I'm not sure why it would be correlated. We _did_ make changes to block packing in v3.1.0, although AFAIK they won't result in blocks with 0 attestation blocks except on hardware that's very strained.

If you have access to metrics/logs from the 6 bloxstaking validators that proposed 0-attestation blocks, do you mind checking two things for me?

- Are there any ERRO logs around the time of the proposal? Particularly ones about a full attestation queue or attestation timeouts
- Do you see a plateau in the `beacon_op_pool_attestations_total` metric before the time of the proposal?
